name: Kirin Come
description:
After leaving Earth at the brink of the planet’s destruction, mankind is on its way to conquer the space frontier… only for a hyperdrive malfunction to leave them stranded in the Consuello star system that doesn’t have a single hard-surfaced planet.

Rachel Reid is a space delivery worker, hauling goods from one asteroid to another. Despite her best efforts, the young woman is stuck in a lower managerial position and is having trouble earning a promotion.

Yet she is blessed with a sudden opportunity. She only needs to deliver seven urgent orders to finally move up on the corporate ladder, but it seems like the Universe stands in her way. What will Rachel do to get the position she’s been dreaming of for so long?

Kirin Come is a SCI-FI Visual Novel. It tells a story of the events that happen in a forgotten corner of space during a twenty-year timespan and features a huge cast of characters. The protagonists, Rachel and Mary, are bound to change the Consuello system beyond recognition with their actions!

- Incredible SCI-FI adventure!
- Excellent comedy
- Amazing artstyle and soundtracks
- Unique and peculiar world
- Colorful cast of characters
- Complex, well thought-out plot
